title: Discrete Optimization
description: Fundamentals of integer and combinatorial optimization. Topics include polyhedra, cuts, Lagrangean duality, complexity, and others.  This course is intended for Ph.D. students.

prerequisites: ISYE 6661 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
